updateArrival() - Method in interface cctair.menu.InterfaceMenu
 
updateArrival() - Method in class cctair.menu.Menu

updateFlight() - Method in class cctair.menu.Menu

updateFlightsPilot(String) - Method in interface cctair.menu.InterfaceMenu
 
updateFlightsPilot(String) - Method in class cctair.menu.Menu
This method changes the Flight's pilot and copilot This method shows you, first, the flights in a simplified version and after choosing flight it shows you the pilots Not all pilots can be the first pilot of the aircraft (depending of the license) but all pilots can be copilot It takes the parameter:
updateSchedule() - Method in interface cctair.menu.InterfaceMenu
 
updateSchedule() - Method in class cctair.menu.Menu
This method updates the Schedule of the flight, in other words The Departure and The Arrival Time.
